Ranco:
He turned to, afraid for the first time since he was born, and ran off after Cygnar. He opened a comm, "Excuse me, Cygnar? What was that thing?"
 Rudra656@... wrote:::Cygnar:: 
      He shakes his head.  "No.  I'm leaving now.  Do not fear Hydras, we shall meet on the battlefield someday."  He salutes mockingly and turns flying off into the woods.
